item.title: Gattu Mandal Shines in Sampoornata Abhiyan, Bags State Honour
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: Gattu Mandal of Jogulamba Gadwal district has earned prestigious state-level recognition for its remarkable performance under the Sampoornata Abhiyan, a flagship initiative aimed at achieving 100% saturation in key developmental indicators. The initiative, overseen by the CEO of NITI Aayog, was conducted from July to September 2024 across aspirational districts and blocks nationwide.
In a ceremony held at Raj Bhavan on Saturday, Telangana Governor Shri Jishnu Dev Varma felicitated the d...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh

item.title: Gattu Mandal Excels in Sampoornata Abhiyan, Wins State Award
item.description:
<![CDATA[-Advertisement-
Gadwal: Gattu Mandal in the Jogulamba Gadwal district has achieved state-level recognition for its outstanding work in the Sampoornata Abhiyan program. This initiative aims for complete development in critical areas and was led by the CEO of NITI Aayog from July to September 2024 across various districts and blocks.
On Saturday, Telangana Governor Shri Jishnu Dev Varma awarded Copper Medals to the district administration during a ceremony at Raj Bhavan. This honor was for Gattu...]]>
